sentences.en: Carefully place the spindle in the sample, again attempting to avoid air entrapment.
sentences.cn: 小心地将在轴放入试样中, 再次将气泡排除.

sentences.en: Conclusion Microsurgical technique was an effective method to treat peripheral entrapment neuropathy.
sentences.cn: 目的:为探讨显微外科技术治疗周围神经嵌压症的疗效.

sentences.en: Dirty steel due to entrapment of slag or pieces of refractory.
sentences.cn: 因夹杂炉渣或耐火材料颗粒而造成的不纯净钢.

sentences.en: Entrapment of oil has resulted from a combination of stratigraphic and structural factors.
sentences.cn: 石油的捕集是由地层和构造两种因素结合起来造成的.

sentences.en: Gin: I said this is called entrapment.
sentences.cn: 金: 我说过这是诱捕.

sentences.en: Grounding Totem: This totem will no longer absorb multiple effects from Entrapment in a 10 second period.
sentences.cn: 根基图腾: 根基图腾不会在10秒内多次吸收猎人陷阱造成的诱捕效果.

sentences.en: It was named entrapment syndrome of lateral intermuscular septum of arm for its pathogenesis.
sentences.cn: 根据其发病机制命名为臂外侧肌间隔卡压综合征.

sentences.en: Mac: No, actually it's called blackmail. Entrapment is what cops do to thieves.
sentences.cn: 迈克: 不, 实际上叫作勒索. 诱捕是警察对付贼的手段.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the diagnosis and treatment procedures of left renal vein entrapment syndrome.
sentences.cn: 目的提高左肾静脉压迫综合征的诊治水平.

sentences.en: The dust particles adhere to the fabric due to entrapment and surface forces.
sentences.cn: 由于滞留作用和表面力. 灰尘微粒会附着在织物上.

sentences.en: The entrapment was discovered in May by two bear hunters.
sentences.cn: 5月,两个猎人发现白鲸被困在冰下.

sentences.en: The most common structural targets associated with oil entrapment are anticlines and faults.
sentences.cn: 与储油圈闭有关的最一般的构造目标是背斜和断层.

sentences.en: The purely mechanical effect of glandular trichome exudates is the entrapment and immobilization of small arthropods.
sentences.cn: 具腺毛状体分泌物的纯机械作用是诱捕和粘住小的昆虫.

sentences.en: This paper discusses the concept of slag entrapment in continuous casting and its application in production.
sentences.cn: 提出并讨论了卷渣指数的概念,指出其在板坯连铸中的应用.

sentences.en: To prepare clindamycin phosphate liposome, and to determine the entrapment efficiency and particle diameter of it.
sentences.cn: 目的制备克林霉素磷酸酯脂质体并测定包封率及粒径.

trans.tran_cn: （非法）诱捕，诱人犯罪，诱使犯罪
trans.tran_en: the practice of trapping someone by tricking them, especially to show that they are guilty of a crime
